summary: Adds a updated version of my first mod (personal camp) to skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
====Description==== Yes, i know this type of mod has been done before, this is just my version.

Hi!, ever wanted your own personal campsite built to perfection for most players?. Then this is for you!, 
This mod was built by me for my own character because i kept on getting frustrated with the confusion 
of all the house mods available to such a extent that i wouldnt use them. This fixed that for me 
as the campsite is small/socluded away and excellent for levels 1-30. 


====Features==== 

-A secluded campsite by a small waterfall with ambient noises such as frogs. 
Crafting features: 
-Fully working Smelter 
-Tanning rack 
-Chopping block 
-Cooking pot 
-Anvil 

And more to come if requested!. 


-Ambient fog and mist with custom lighting for fires and candles. 



This mod is my best mod ever made in terms of performance and is optimized to a very high extent, 
to a point when you will not see any loads lags reaching the area and a fps constant too. 


I hope you enjoy this small mod i have made and happy adventuring!
author: Countercruel
